description: Detects process LSASS memory dump using Mimikatz, NanoDump, Invoke-Mimikatz, Procdump or Taskmgr based on the CallTrace pointing to ntdll.dll, dbghelp.dll or dbgcore.dll for win10, server2016 and up. Author: Samir Bousseaden, Michael Haag. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: False positives are present when looking for 0x1410. Exclusions may be required.
name: LSASS Memory Dump
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\lsass.exe AND winlog.event_data.GrantedAccess:(*0x1038* OR *0x40* OR *0x1438* OR *0x143a*) AND winlog.event_data.CallTrace:(*dbghelp.dll* OR *dbgcore.dll* OR *ntdll.dll*))
